briefTitle: Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Dasiglucagon in Children With Congenital Hyperinsulinism
officialTitle: A Randomized Trial in 2 Parts: Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Crossover Part 1 and Open-label Part 2, Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Dasiglucagon for the Treatment of Children With Congenital Hyperinsulinism
summary: The objective of the trial is to evaluate the efficacy of dasiglucagon in reducing glucose requirements in children with persistent congenital hyperinsulinism (CHI) requiring continuous intravenous (IV) glucose administration to prevent/manage hypoglycemia.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Hours 36-48 after initiation of trial drug (Part 1)
